line.text: ' hours. Attacking them anyway would cause 20 infamy. Are you sure?'
'Declaring a permanent war with another faction is irreversible. Are you sure?'
'Transfer impossible: the faction does not have an Outpost'

line.text: ' infamy. They do not trust you and will not sell their sectors.'
'Factions don't sell their most valuable sectors unless they are under your influence (ie. adjacent).'
'Factions don't sell sectors that are claimed, or if you didn't discover it.'
'Factions don't sell sectors if their empire is too small.'
'Buying a sector not only require money, but also local reputation, which can be achieved by doing missions.'
'Buying a sector will increase the price of other sectors. Cumulative effect.'
'All stations are included in the transaction.'
'Declaring a permanent war will give you 1 maximum perk in each of your Outpost. It cannot be undone.'
'You are in permanent war with that faction.'
'Cannot declare permanent war against the Yakis.'
'Revoke your offer to form a coalition against the '
'Once a coalition actually exists this option will be unavailable.'
'Declare that you want to form a coalition against the '
'This joins you with liikeminded partners. See relations tab.'
'You are in a coalition against that faction.'
'It can only end once they have been weakened enough.'
'Declaring permanent war is not possible. The galaxy has to stand united.'
'Your permanent war will continue as soon as this crisis has been resolved.'
' Your Pact is about to time out in an hour or so.'
'They have declared war on you in the past. Terracorp law would convert any truce with them into a non-aggression pact, lasting 12h to 3 days.'
'They want to make peace in general but you are in a coalition war and have to pull through.'
'They are in trouble and would like to make peace with you.'
' infamy. They do not believe that you would honor a Truce.'
'First they want to finish an ongoing military operation against you.'
'Restores your reputation but the Truce will last longer, depending on territory size difference.'
'Your reputation with that faction is too low.'

line.comment: * add custom dynamic menu item to array $menu: text=$t return value='buyFavor'

line.text: 'Reduces cost: Reputation Rank 9 and 10, having enough loyalty to buy 1 favor but not spend it.'
'Killing a Kha'ak Hive Queen also grants a point.'
'These settings control which galaxy news you will get for this faction.'

line.comment: * skip if [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.IsMonitored' : objectOrSector=$sector race=[Player]

line.text: 'Reduced maintenance of TLs and TMs built from this sector (retroactive)'
'Reduced maintenance of M7s built from this sector (retroactive)'
'Reduced maintenance of M2s built from this sector (retroactive)'
'Reduced maintenance of fighters built from this sector (retroactive)'
'As Independents, you automatically claim a sector when you destroy a station'
'You can conquer an empty sector by building any station from a TL'
'You can only terraform planets in sectors you own.'
'Terraforming a planet is a dangerous process. Do you want to continue?'
